channel.title: Player death causes CRASH!
channel.description:
hey guys this is my first post on here
i got into a little trouble...
my client crashes when ever a player dies... it is standard moparscape client
here is the error message i get
java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 21 at client.saveStats(client.java:4124) at client.packetProcess(client.java:7587) at client.packetSending(client.java:7575) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:121) at server.main(server.java:49) SERVER NAME Server [fatal] - exception Game saved for player dead
can any one help?
pleez
any helpfull comments will be much appreicaited
thanks in advance

item.title: Player death causes CRASH!
item.dc:creator: @Tech_Booey Tech_Booey
item.description:
@Tech_Booey wrote:

         	MyOutput.print(statName[i] + " - " + playerLevel[i]  + " - " + playerXP[i] + "\n");

thats the line… any ideas?

soz im a bit new to all this…

:S

Read full topic

item.title: Player death causes CRASH!
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

There was an exception in the saveStats method, on line 4124. Show it to us.

Read full topic

item.description:

ok cheers i’ll give it a go [br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 09, 2008, 03:19:07 pm[/size][hr]couldnt see any problems…
any other ideas?

could it be a problem with the client?
